title: Pharmacy Technician Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Concord Hospital (Laconia, NH)
Interview Descriptions: The interview was easy, simple, straightforward and easy to understand. The interviewer was professional, inquisitive and approachable. The interview lasted about 30 minutes. Had to wait about 2-3 weeks to get an answer on the status of the job.
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in 5 years?

title: Payroll Specialist Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Concord Hospital (Concord, CA)
Interview Descriptions: Was on teams , they asked payroll processing . About software myob , xero other related questions. Two rounds of interview. The first round had behavioural questions. The second round was about the role and applications used.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Concord Hospital in Feb 2021
Interview Descriptions: They are a great company to work for and always interview professionally.  I found my time with them to be appealing. They don't seem to pay as much as surrounding hospitals but there are perks that come with the job

title: LNA Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Concord Hospital (Concord, NH) in Aug 2019
Interview Descriptions: Applied online, got interview request through email, met with HR then sent to floor for a 3 panel interview. Was offered a job shadow, then was told I’d know in a week. It took over two weeks to hear back

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Concord Hospital
Interview Descriptions: Panel interview with the management team.  I met with the management team and the nurse educator.  Talked about the typical interview stuff and what the job is like.  Job shadowed immediately after the interview

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Concord Hospital
Interview Descriptions: 3-person panel with job shadow afterwards. I enjoyed meeting with the RN manager, the Nursing Director and the Nurse Educator. I also enjoyed having the ability to shadow and actually see how people worked together
Interview Questions: How do you handle conflict with other co-workers?

title: Patient Care Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Concord Hospital (Concord, NH) in Jul 2018
Interview Descriptions: It was very hard to get an interview. Once I was at the interview they read questions off a list. Then I had an interview with HR, they give you a pay range but nothing specific, references are checked, and thwn you wait...and wait.
Interview Questions: What can you contribute that others can't?

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Concord Hospital
Interview Descriptions: Very professional, direct and clear job description. The unit mgr was friendly and welcoming. It was refreshing to havw a unit open to talking about family and school obligations. Welcoming environment

title: Patient Care Coordinator Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Concord Hospital (Concord, NH) in Apr 2017
Interview Descriptions: Filled out online job application, Received an email to come in for an interview. Had to provide references that needed to fill out skill survey. Met with HR and Office Manager. Was told it could take up to month to hear back.

title: RN Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Concord Hospital (Concord, NH) in Jan 2015
Interview Descriptions: Apply online, get called back from unit manager or director, go for interview with unit director then get sent to have interview with HR. Following that you are expected to contact references via email for them to complete survey about you. Units offer job shadow if interested. Once interested and references were verified HR will call you back and offer job via phone and talk about salary.

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 months. I interviewed at Concord Hospital (Concord, NH) in Nov 2014
Interview Descriptions: Phone interview with Talent Coordinator. Interview with manager, educator, and dept head. Job shadow for a day. Check references online. Get verbal offer. Take physical. It takes about 3 months.
Interview Questions: Questioned me about different patient scenarios. Asked my background. Explained the job.

title: Physician Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at Concord Hospital

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Concord Hospital (Concord, NH) in Jun 2009
Interview Descriptions: It was very difficult to get them to call me for an interview.  I had to call them and tell them that I was flying to Concord and would like to schedule an interview for that time.  But once I got there the Human Resources person was very friendly and helpful and took me to meet the manager.

title: Training Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Concord Hospital (Concord, NH) in May 2009
Interview Descriptions: Most of the communication with this company went between myself and their HR department. I received all appointed times of phone interviews, 1:1,  and final interview via email. I thought they were very helpful and informative. They were always friendly and professional. I was given all the information I needed to prepare a final presentation for interview.
Interview Questions: There wasn't a difficult or unexpected interview question
